DOC.detailed_description: The situation type 2 DM prevention China serious . The commonly accepted natural course type 2 DM follow : obesity , insulin resistance ( hyperinsulemia ) , abnormal glucose tolerance , DM complication DM ; correspondently , function status pancreas islet β cell : normal , compensatory , decompensatory , impaired failure . Post research prove use medical intervention period insulin resistance function status β cell compensatory , course could reverse . There clinical research effect medical intervention period insulin resistance . This research would take medical intervention subject insulin resistance without abnormal glucose tolerance , see different prevalence abnormal glucose tolerance different group .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 28kg/m2 diagnosis insulin resistance abnormal glucose tolerance function impairment heart , liver kidney
